M, Theocharopoulos E (2007) OGSA-DAI 3.0 - The Whats and the Whys, 
Proceedings of the UK e-Science All Hands Meeting 2007, pp. 158-165

Pearson D. The WS-DAI family of specifications for web service data access and 
integration, ACM SIGMOD Record 35(1), March 2006

[5] Esteban-Gutiérrez M, Kojima I, Pahlevi SM, Corcho O, Gómez-Pérez A (2009)

Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience 21(8):1029-1051 
[6] Gray A J, Gray N, Ounis I (2009) Can RDB2RDF Tools Feasibly Expose Large 
Science Archives for Data Integration? In Proceedings of the 6th European

[7] Haas LM, Freytag JC, Lohman GM, Pirahesh H (1989) Extensible Query

[8] Hartig O, Bizer C, Freytag JC (2009) Executing SPARQL Queries over the Web

[9] Kossmann D (2000) The state of the art in distributed query processing. ACM

[10] Langegger A, Wöß W (2009) RDFStats - An Extensible RDF Statistics Generator

[11] Langegger A, Wöß W, Blöchl M (2008) SemWIQ – Semantic Web Integrator

[12] Lynden S, Mukherjee A, Hume AC, Fernandes AAA, Paton NW, Sakellariou R,

[13] Pérez J, Arenas M, Gutiérrez C (2006) Semantics and Complexity of SPARQL. 
In: Proc. of ISWC 2006. LNCS 4273:30–43. Springer-Verlag 
[14] Quilitz B, Leser U (2008) Querying distributed RDF data sources with SPARQL.

[15] Schenk S, Staab S (2008) Networked graphs: a declarative mechanism for
